title: doesn’t work

Tells me i need a code from the authenticator app, in order to sign into the authenticator.  This is obviously impossible.  It says use other options so i try that, but the two other options are to 1. use the authenticator and 2. use a code from the authenticator.   Why cant there just be an option to send the code to my phone number or something?

title: Horrible
text: It sends a code to my phone. I enter that code on the same phone and click “yes it’s me”. Can repeat that scenario again and again with each new code it sends over and over, and it still won’t let me into my account. It does not seem  to recognize the  codes it sent as being legit. Bizarre that this is an app from Microsoft, the richest company on the planet, and yet is so awful.

title: Faulty recovery loop
text:
Got a new phone and when I try to reconnect to the app it needs to verify my sign in again…through the app. What kind of chicanery is this design?!? My phone cannot have 2 Authenticator screens open at once, so I cannot recover anything with this stupid construct.

My start to 2024 has been ruined, and I don’t know a way around it. There probably is a solution, but everything in the app leads me to the same dead-ends. What an F’ing joke.

title: Useless app
text: I need this app to log into my college email but the it literally refuses to work. I don’t receive a notification to enter a number on the app or anything in that regard. There’s no verification code for me to use as an alternative. I can’t log into my Microsoft account through the app because I have to use the authenticator app to log onto the authenticator app but how can I do that when I’m literally logging onto via the same app. I’ve tried deleting my account, deleting the app, turning in notifications for the app etc. but nothing seems to work. Terrible app

title: TERRIBLE
text: this is the worst app i have ever used. it straight up tells me to open my authentication app WHILE IM IN THE AUTHENTICATION APP!!!!! HOW IS THIS POSSIBLE!!!!

title: It’s certainly secure…
text:
“Sign on to Office”….the Dreaded Words appear. 

Dutifully, I tap the designated spot. I am am to authenticate, with the ironically named Authenticator, you’ll understand the irony in a moment. A code is supplied, which I am to enter into Authenticator…except I am magically already in Authenticator. All I see is the code…with no place to enter it. It’s been like this since I’ve installed the thrice-damned app. Another call to the help desk, I guess.

Congratulations, Microsoft. You have made your products secure from being accessed….by everybody, including the account holder. Good job.

It’s easy if you have a second device, just open Authenticator there. But, I only have the one device; so I’m not worth Microsoft’s time.

title: It works fine until it doesn’t
text:
I’ve used Microsoft Authenticator for 3 years now without a problem. But it seems it underwent some facelifting and the new version LOST MY ACCOUNTS!! so now I’ve lost access to Microsoft accounts, and all the other accounts I had setup. 
Unacceptable error from Microsoft.

title: HUGE bug - no longer usable
text: So I try to get on Teams through my phone and Authenticator sends me a code *on its own app* and tells me to enter it in the app and of course there’s no way to enter a number where the number already is. So I try to do the phone authentication and it calls my phone and tells me I failed to answer correctly?? How the heck does one answer a phone “correctly” for this?  So I can just no longer use Teams on my phone for the rest of my life?! This is insane , which I guess sums MS up perfectly.

title: Annoying

title: DOES NOT WORK
